GSD.product_version: versions from v3.18 to before v5.4.183
GSD.description:
net: arcnet: com20020: Fix null-ptr-deref in com20020pci_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.183 by commit e50c589678e50f8d574612e473ca60ef45190896, it was introduced in version v3.18 by commit 8c14f9c70327a6fb75534c4c61d7ea9c82ccf78f. For more details please see the references link.
